thread.title: Olympic champion skier Miller has favorite in Maryland race
thread.title_full: Olympic champion skier Miller has favorite in Maryland race - Yahoo Sports

author: yahoo
title: Olympic champion skier Miller has favorite in Maryland race
text:
Done LAUREL, Md. (AP) -- Ravenheart is the early 5-2 favorite in the $100,000 Maryland Million Nursery for owner and Olympic champion skier Bode Miller.
The six-furlong race for 2-year-olds is one of 11 on the Jim McKay Maryland Million card Saturday at Laurel Park.
Miller purchased a barn at Fair Hill training center in northeast Maryland this year with the goal of becoming a trainer.
Ravenheart, who won his debut race at Delaware Park on Oct. 3, is trained by Francis ''Tres'' Albert II. The 2-year-old Maryland-bred was purchased for $27,000 at last year's Mid-Atlantic fall yearlings sale at Timonium. Carol Cedeno will be aboard.
Albert said Miller won't attend the race. The skier plans to skip this season's World Cup circuit to spend more time with his wife and recently born son.
Sports & Recreation Horse Racing Maryland Million Nursery   5379/10000   29362/79545   1923/4772
